meanings.definition: A very small machine or robot that has the ability to perform specific tasks at the nanoscale.
meanings.sent1: The nanite repaired the tiny circuit.
meanings.sent2: Scientists are developing nanites for medical purposes.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous nanite decided to clean the entire lab on its own.
meanings.sent4: The nanite worked tirelessly, like a tiny superhero in the machine world.
meanings.sent5: Imagine a swarm of nanites fixing everything around you effortlessly.

meanings.definition: A unit of measurement equal to one billionth of a meter.
meanings.sent1: The scientist measured the particle using a nanite.
meanings.sent2: The nanite is a crucial unit in nanotechnology.
meanings.sent3: The ruler was so small that it needed a nanite to measure accurately.
meanings.sent4: In the world of tiny measurements, the nanite reigns supreme.
meanings.sent5: Visualize a nanite as a tiny ruler measuring the smallest distances.
